title: 314: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 1 (Playbooks, Red Flags, & Clear Front Runners)
itunes:title: 314: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 1 (Playbooks, Red Flags, & Clear Front Runners)
description:
Michelle’s season is here and it’s time to recap, Broads! Bekah and Jess discuss their thoughts on Michelle as Bachelorette, Ryan’s playbook debacle, Nayte’s many wins, questions about Joe, limo entrances they loved, but mostly limo entrances that made them uncomfy, theories about a future season villain, and much more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***CROWDHEALTH: get 30 days to try risk-free plus the Fitness Wearable at JOINCROWDHEALTH.COM/FIT and enter code CHATTY at sign up!
